reviews.text: When we checked in, I was quoted $15 more than I was told over phone and our travel companions $16 more than the quote price and the lady at the front desk snapped and argued and unfortunately my husband deleted our confirmation email so we paid it. The room was clean, the pool was nice, so I gave them extra stars for that. The guy that works here is equally rude. Didnt want to give us extra towels after the kids went to the pool. Won't stay here again... If youre looking for a hotel with a decent price and a pool, there are several more down the strip worth checking out!
reviews.title: Rudest staff I've ever encountered.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stay in the travelodge on the Wenatchee ave, the room are dirty the sheets were not clean. The room smelled like mold. On too the pictures on the website look nothing like the rooms. The service at the front seat wAs not professional at all. The girl was rude. I think this hotel should be shut down.
reviews.title: Horrible

reviews.text: We stayed here for a night for the Special Olympics Washington State Winter Games. I feel it was a very good value for the price. We arrived at least 2 hours before the listed check-in time but, since they had a room available, we were able to check in and unload our items. It was quick and friendly. The hotel has exterior doors and you can park in front of or near your room. The hotel is in a convenient location and you can access quite a few restaurants and shopping within about 3/4 of a mile [save on gas!].
reviews.title: Good Value For The Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was small and cozy [1 queen bed], but just right for 2 of us. One thing I noticed is that the room was exceptionally clean. And I really checked the room out. The bed linens were soft and comfy, and the bed was firm - but not brick-like. Bathroom towels were soft and absorbent. The room maintained a good temperature :)
reviews.title: Cheap, OK rooms, but poor service

reviews.text: The only "issues" I may have had were not under the hotel's control. Noise from other rooms [doors, shower running, and what sounded like marbles rolling on the tile floor in the bathroom] didn't interfere with sleep. There's a nice "expanded" continental breakfast, but do watch out for people that don't supervise older kids/tweens.
reviews.title: 3:00AM wake up

reviews.text: Landscaping gave the wrong impression with weeds everywhere, but the rooms were tidy and beds were comfortable. New flat screen TVs. Door didn't close properly, so we had to jam a brochure in the latch to keep the traffic noise down and heat in the room. Breakfast was very minimal, but was replenished while we were there. How about some fresh fruit (Apples from Wenatchee?!?) Not too fond of the breakfast being located right at the front desk. "Renovations" were in-progress, with half a tiled floor completed, which I tripped over, due to the uneven surface. Same in the ice machine room, with a 1-inch surface difference. Concrete stairs and railings had seen better days and need to be repaired or replaced. The place needs a good power washing. With a little work, this is a gem in Wenatchee, with downtown shopping close at hand.
reviews.title: Property needs work, but rooms were good.

reviews.text: Super helpful staff, Sean is a legend. Room had all that'd you'd expect. Bed was comfy and clean. No faults for the price, especially. Stayed for two weeks and had no dramas at all. Check it out, I'd say.
reviews.title: Clean and tidy. Can't go wrong.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not a classy or 4-star place, but its not advertised that way. If you are looking for a budget hotel that is clean and safe...without dipping to the $35 roachfested places next door, come here.
reviews.title: Very good place for Budget Minded

reviews.text: Was a bit noisy with the hwy nearby and there was a semi that parked behind our room in a lot or something that left itself idling for a good 30 minutes. Soundproofing in the room needs some work. Could hear our neighbors laughing but after 11pm everyone quieted down.
reviews.title: Emily was pleasant and helpful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a breakfast buffet in the lobby but I drove to leavenworth for a baverian breakfast on this visit.
reviews.title: Great Value
